titleproper.value:
Guide to the Scott and Gary Show Archive
                    <lb/>ca. 1983-1989
                    <lb/>
                    <num>MSS 247</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Lawrence Giffin, 2009. Additional media processing by Elizabeth Weist and Rhyannon Rodriguez, 2009.

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2015-11-19T13:23-0500</date>

p.value: Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.

Published citations should take the following form:
                <lb/>
                <lb/> Identification of item, date (if known); The Scott and Gary Show Archive; MSS 247; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

The show is notable for early appearances of bands such as the Butthole Surfers and the Beastie Boys (who appear with drummer Kate Schellenbach, later of Luscious Jackson). Other musical guests include the Ben Vaughn Combo, Raunch Hands, Half Japanese, Shockabilly, and Velvet Monkeys.

<emph render="bold">Series II: Video</emph>. This series is divided into two subseries. Subseries A contains access copies for the researcher. At present, access copies have not been created for all material. Please contact a Fales archivist. Subseries B contains original video elements.

dsc.value:
Series I: Informational Binders Scott and Gary Show Informational Binder I 1 1 1983-2002 Scott and Gary Show Informational Binder II 1 2 1983-2002 Series II: Video recordings Conditions Governing Access

Original material may not be available for consultation. Please ask a Fales archivist for access. Also see Series II: Subseries A: Video Access Copies
